review: I love this little gadget. It allows me to magically make shows go from my phone to the TV. Seriously cool for the not to advanced person like me.
author: Tiffany

review: My fourth Chromecast purchase. This time for my brother. He and his wife love it.
author: Tim Gonzales

review: this is great!!! love it, delivered on time
author: gina

review: Love the fact that all I have to do is tap the chromecast icon on my galaxy S4 and the video or movie will pop up on my tv from my phone! How cool is that!
author: Veronica Davis
